titles: Antinomianism discovered and confuted: and free-grace as it is held forth in Gods word: as well by the prophets in the Old Testament, as by the apostles and Christ himself in the New, shewed to be other then is by the Antinomian-party in these times maintained. / By Thomas Gataker, B.D. and pastor of Rotherhith.
author: Gataker, Thomas, 1574-1654.
publisher: Printed by T.R. and E.M. and are to be sold by J.B. at the Guilded Acorn in Pauls Church-yard, near the little North-door,
notes: With a preliminary leaf of advertisement.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Antinomianism --  Controversial literature --  Early works to 1800.
